db:select.doc:name: Select Postgres Databse
db:select.db:sql: SELECT * FROM american ORDER BY american_id ASC

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json --- payload map ( payload01 , indexOfPayload01 ) -> { ID: payload01.american_id, code: payload01.code, price: payload01.price, departureDate: payload01.departure_date, origin: payload01.origin, destination: payload01.destination, emptySeats: payload01.empty_seats, plane: { "type": payload01.plane_type, totalSeats: payload01.plane_total_seats } }

%dw 2.0 output application/json --- { ID: payload.american_id, code: payload.code default "", price: payload.price default 0, departureDate: payload.departure_date, origin: payload.origin default "", destination: payload.destination default "", emptySeats: payload.empty_seats default 0, plane: { "type": payload.plane_type default "", totalSeats: payload.plane_total_seats default 0 } }

db:insert.db:sql: INSERT INTO american (code, price, departure_date, origin, destination, empty_seats, plane_type, plane_total_seats) VALUES (:code, :price, :depDate, :origin, :dest, :emptySeats, :planeType, :planeTotalSeats);
db:insert.db:input-parameters: #[{ 'code': payload.code, 'price': payload.price, 'depDate': payload.departureDate, 'origin': payload.origin, 'dest': payload.destination, 'emptySeats': payload.emptySeats, 'planeType': payload.planeType, 'planeTotalSeats': payload.planeTotalSeats }]

ee:message.ee:set-payload:
%dw 2.0 output application/java type AmericanFlight = Object {class: "com.revature.pojo.AmericanFlight"} type localDate = Object {class: "java.time.LocalDate"} --- { code: payload.code, price: payload.price as Number {class:"java.lang.Float"}, origin: payload.origin, destination: payload.destination, emptySeats: payload.emptySeats as Number {class:"java.lang.Integer"}, planeType: payload.plane."type" as String default "", planeTotalSeats: payload.plane.totalSeats as Number {class:"java.lang.Integer"} default 1, departureDate: payload.departureDate
}as AmericanFlight

db:update.db:sql: update american set code = :code, price = :price, departure_date = :depDate, origin = :origin, destination = :dest, empty_seats = :emptySeats, plane_type = :planeType, plane_total_seats = :planeTotalSeats where american_id = :ID
